name: @formonsus/vue-plugin-cli
description: Cli tool to create Vue plugins with Rollup
author: Aleksandar Milicevic

scripts.version:patch: yarn changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: update CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.version:minor: yarn changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: update CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.version:major: yarn changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: update CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
